form.label: MITRE ATT&CK Rule Finder
form.description: Please enter the technique name in order to find the related correlation rules defined within Enterprise Security.

search.query: | inputlookup mitre_all_rule_technique_lookup | `lookup_technique_tactic_from_rule_name` | search technique_name=$mitre_technique_name$ | eval app_name=mvdedup(app_name), rule_disabled=mvdedup(rule_disabled) | eval Status = if(rule_disabled=0,"Enabled","Disabled") | rename rule_name as "Rule Name", app_name as "Application", tactic_id as "Tactic ID", tactic_name as "Tactic", technique_id as "Technique ID", technique_name as "Technique" | fields "Rule Name", "Application", Status, "Tactic ID", "Tactic", "Technique ID", "Technique"
